description:
With a local festival coming to the area, Yotsuyu wants to use this as an opportunity to improve Narikozaka Manufacturing`s image.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Festival Revelry! Narikozaka! (Preparations) / Festival Revelry! Narikozaka! (The Event)
Omatsurisawagi Da yo! Narukozaka! (Junbi Hen) / Omatsurisawagi Da yo! Narukozaka! (Toujitsu Hen)
お祭り騒ぎだヨ! 成子坂! (準備編) / お祭り騒ぎだヨ! 成子坂! (当日編)
